mapper.select: SELECT r.`object_id` FROM `apartment_card` a JOIN `apartment_card_attribute` reg ON (a.`object_id` = reg.`object_id` AND reg.`attribute_type_id` = #{apartmentCardRegistrationAT} AND reg.`status` = 'ACTIVE') JOIN `registration` r ON (r.`object_id` = reg.`value_id` AND r.`status` = 'ACTIVE') JOIN `registration_attribute` pers ON (r.`object_id` = pers.`object_id` AND pers.`attribute_type_id` = #{registrationPersonAT} AND pers.`status` = 'ACTIVE' AND pers.`value_id` = #{personId}) WHERE a.`status` = 'ACTIVE' AND a.`object_id` = #{apartmentCardId} LIMIT 0,1
